scripts.simple: yarn node src/main.ts simple.thermal && yarn run esbuild dist/simple.js --bundle --outfile=build/simple.js
scripts.ticktac: yarn node src/main.ts ticktac.thermal && yarn run esbuild dist/ticktac.js --bundle --outfile=build/simple.js --minify
scripts.proto: yarn node src/main.ts proto.thermal && yarn run esbuild dist/proto.js --bundle --outfile=build/simple.js
